All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
This is my model for the accounts table using persistence to map this entity
AccountController
This is the controller for all account based activity
AccountRepository
This is the repository for the accounts this helps store and retrieve account info from the database
AdvisorController
This allows the handling of the registered user in all controllers in the application
AppConfig
This configuration is to tell the application where the resources are inside this is to ensure the application works smoothly
AppController
This is the controller for the dashboard as well as the menu navigation at the top of the page once logged in
AppInterceptor
This handles exceptions as well as the security when someone tries to intercept on the app website
AuthController
This is the Authentication controller for when a user is logging in or logging out
CapstoneBankDemoApplication
 
GenAccountNumber
This is a helper class to generate an account number for users when they create an account
IndexController
This is the index controller for the main page and the errors that could occur
Payment
This is my model for the payments table using persistence to map this entity
PaymentHistory
This is the model for the View of payments that will be used in the payments history page
PaymentHistoryRepository
This is the Payment History Repository that helps retrieve the view from the database for payment history
PaymentRepository
This is the Payment Repository that helps inset values in the payments database
RegisterController
This is the controller to control the registration page of the application
Transact
This is the transactional model that allows for transactions to be done and then later on logged
TransactHistoryRepository
This is the transactional history repository that helps get the transaction history from the database
TransactionController
This is the controller for the different transactions a user can do
TransactionHistory
This is the transaction history model for the transaction history page
TransactRepository
This is the Transaction repository that allows transactons to be put stored in the database
User
This is my model for the users table using persistence to map this entity
UserRepository
This is the repository for the User Table (connects to the user entity)
